data.name: Google Keep custom background
data.description:
Choose your own background color for Google Keep.

 - Only affects background color behind the notes; not the notes themselves.
 - Only applies to Google Keep.
 - Defaults to a "red wine" background
 - Sidebar text color automatically adjusts to contrast with your chosen background color

Click "Customize Settings" gear icon above to set your own color.

user.name: Sam Nordberg
user.about: Just upping some styles that I personally made for my convenience. They're not perfect, but I think satisfactory.

data.name: Lichess Board: Pure Colour Chess Boards
data.description:
12 Pure Colour Chess Boards for Lichess

Choose any of first 12 boards theme to activate the board style

data.name: Sense-Scans Reader Dark
data.description:
This is a dark themed userstyle for the sense-scans reader.
Also gets rid of the facebook link, because who actually cares and double spread pages are resized properly.

data.name: 린
Terraria Forums ULTRADARK
data.description: This is a project to create a proper dark mode for the Terraria Forums. I am open to suggestions, should I have missed a part of the website, or other. This style is compatible with existing styles on the website itself, as they will alter certain text colours and elements.

Youtube Dark Blue
data.description:
YouTube's dark theme with a darker background and blue. It also includes some other cool features!
This works with the current version of Youtube UI (2020).

(TY dark theme must be activated!)
